entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:46 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -29.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 12:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -29.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -32.8°C
Wind: NW 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 9:15 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:15 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:15 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
